name: Game Feel week 3 (3026284)
description:
Move mouse to select menu objects, left click to interact.

A D or  ← → keys to move.

Space to jump.

Esc to pause.

Music and sounds used from Opengameart.org:

Maou - Sci-fi Theme

David McKee - UI SFX Pack 2 Sample

ViRiX - UI and Item sound effect Jingles Sample 2
